title: [Build Submission] investec-swipe-n-save
body: ### Project Name Investec Swipe-n-Save ### Your Name or Team Peter Smythe ### Repository/Code Link https://github.com/petersmythe/investec-swipe-n-save ### Live Demo (if any) _No response_ ### Description Card Code Snippet Creation. Put aside money into a savings account each time you swipe your credit card. ### Screenshots or GIFs ### How to Run/Use It Copy & paste the provided Main and Env files into your existing Investec card IDE. And deploy. ### Code of Conduct - [x] I agree to follow the Investec Developer Community Code of Conduct
